body_html: I have tried with different batch sizes but it still crashes. I am running it on an AWS x2-large GPU instance which has 15 GB RAM. it fails in the read_data part of translate.py script. when I do htop, I see that the memory usage keeps increasing. Can you please tell me how can I run the machine translation example on smaller data? currently its running on training-giga-fren.tar
